detectors.description: FF6000.random() (contracts/erc20Approve.sol#113-120) uses a weak PRNG: randomnumber (contracts/erc20Approve.sol#119)

FF6000.random() (contracts/erc20Approve.sol#113-120) uses a weak PRNG due to hashing tx inputs: randomnumber = uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(block.timestamp,msg.sender,nonce))) % 1000 (contracts/erc20Approve.sol#114-116)
